name: COD_COMMENTS
description: The hospital account coding comments metadata.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COD_CMT_USER_ID
columns.description: User who wrote the comments regarding the coding of the account

columns.name: COD_CMT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: COD_CMT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant the comments regarding the coding of the account were written

columns.name: COD_CMT_START_LN
columns.description: This column stores the start line of the comment stored on the hospital account record.
